page.title: 10Andoversford - Resident F(1)
page.content: S Miss Timms has lived in Andoversford for 70 years.When she came to Andoversford there were only 36 houses.Now that figure has doubled. Her first school was Dowdeswell which was three miles walk from Andoversford.School fashion was very different.She wore a long skirt,dowdy hat,black boots and black stockings. When she left Dowdeswell school she worked at Andoversford school as a canteen lady for 42 years.Andoversford school opened in 1928. She has won many cups for cooking and flower arranging.She is the Treasurer of the Agricultural Society.She has been the Treasure 40 years.
